name: Jupiter Coffee
description:
It's Alyssa's birthday, but she has to finish her shift at Jupiter's Coffee before she gets to celebrate.

Short game made in a few days for my s/o's birthday. It's about serving coffee to her friends and is full of inside jokes. Recommended to play your favorite music while playing, as there's no audio (maybe next time Milky Tracker!). Made with GB Studio

Controls: arrow keys and Z
